bioAsHtml: Viktor ”√” Klang, Deputy CTO at Typesafe, is a distributed and concurrent programming enthusiast who is the former Tech Lead for the Akka project, a founding member of the Reactive Streams Initiative and a principal contributor to scala.concurrent—concurrency utilities for the Scala Standard Library.

acceptedTalks.title: Back to BASICS - Back-pressured Asynchronous Scalable Immutable Composable Streams

bio: Viktor ”√” Klang, Deputy CTO at Typesafe, is a distributed and concurrent programming enthusiast who is the former Tech Lead for the Akka project, a founding member of the Reactive Streams Initiative and a principal contributor to scala.concurrent—concurrency utilities for the Scala Standard Library.
